name: Hell Week
description:
It's the last week of the semester. For the students at the local high school, that could only mean one thing: Hell Week. For Kai, however, who lives alone and has no support from relatives, it might as well be literal hell...

For five days, help Kai prepare for the day, go to school, and work until evening. At the end of each day, decide if he should rest or study until morning, but choose wisely: Kai can only afford to rest once this week...

How will Kai end up by the end of Hell Week?

Credits

  • Submission for the DevelUP Game Jam 2122B-2
  • Contributors
    • Michaela Olalia: Character Art, Scouting for Background Art and Music
    • Aljo San Pedro: Game Code, Art and Music Code, Minigames
    • Aljo and Micha: Concept, Planning, Design, Script
  • Backgrounds: Noraneko Games @ Noranekokgames.itch.io
  • Minigames Art: Kenney @ kenney.nl
  • Music: 
    • All music licensed to YouTube by TRACKS Inc. on behalf of DOVA-SYNDROME
    • YouTube playlist of all tracks used here
  • Made using the Godot Engine
